Title: Big Top Scooby-Doo!
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Mystery
Actors: Frank Welker, Mindy Cohn, Grey Griffin, Matthew Lillard
Plot: Scooby-Doo and the gang investigates the mystery of a chain of jewel robbery's exclusively reported that the robberies where made by werewolves. The team decides in going undercover as circus performers in order to catch the one/s responsible.
